text: REPOSTING HERE SO ALL DOG OWNERS ARE AWARE! <!channel> hi everyone! Megan is fostering a tiny kitten that requires syringe feeding every couple of hours. She’d like to bring him in a couple days this week while he’s on this feeding schedule starting tomorrow.  She would keep him inside his kennel except for feedings. Please DM me if you are allergic to cats, are uncomfortable with a kitten being in the office, or have any other concerns!
